Java SE 15 & JDK 15

Uses of Class
javax.net.ssl.SNIServerName

Packages that use SNIServerName
Package Description
javax.net.ssl
Provides classes for the secure socket package.

  • Uses of SNIServerName in javax.net.ssl

    Subclasses of SNIServerName in javax.net.ssl
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  SNIHostName
    Instances of this class represent a server name of type host_name in a Server Name Indication (SNI) extension.
    Methods in javax.net.ssl that return types with arguments of type SNIServerName
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    List<SNIServerName> ExtendedSSLSession.getRequestedServerNames()
    Obtains a List containing all SNIServerNames of the requested Server Name Indication (SNI) extension.
    List<SNIServerName> SSLParameters.getServerNames()
    Returns a List containing all SNIServerNames of the Server Name Indication (SNI) parameter, or null if none has been set.
    Methods in javax.net.ssl with parameters of type SNIServerName
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract boolean SNIMatcher.matches​(SNIServerName serverName)
    Attempts to match the given SNIServerName.
    Method parameters in javax.net.ssl with type arguments of type SNIServerName
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void SSLParameters.setServerNames​(List<SNIServerName> serverNames)
    Sets the desired SNIServerNames of the Server Name Indication (SNI) parameter.
